description: A simple grammar: cycles of pairs of sequences.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 788
maple: spec := [S,{B=Sequence(Z,1 <= card),C=Prod(B,B),S= Cycle(C)},unlabeled]: seq(combstruct[count](spec, size=n), n=0..20);
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
extensions: More terms from _Alois P. Heinz_, Jan 25 2015
